text:
Hi <@U05HQ02TATB>! You can easily configure a new section and style it with CSS to drag and drop the form on the right side, just the way you want it!

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags/dnd-areas>

Hey all, Happy Friday :smile:
We have a magento 2 site and a blog which is hosted on HubSpot. We want to integrated the menu of our magento 2 site to the blog site. Can anyone suggest some of the steps to follow on this integration?
Thank you!
Hey Robby, thank you for flagging this, I've got our team looking into it as the documentation on child themes suggests this _should_ work. I'll report back once we have something more concrete!

Hey Maxwell,
I appreciate the response.  Looking forward to hearing back from you!
